verbs.description: fragmentize (third-person singular simple present fragmentizes, present participle fragmentizing, simple past and past participle fragmentized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To break, cut, or otherwise separate (something) into fragments.
examples: [I]t was against fragmentizing the human soul that he was prepared to protest with the whole force of his life.

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To fall into or become separated into fragments.
